des: "This is great for those hurried evenings when you don't have much time for preparations!  Only three ingredients! So quick and easy to prepare, and tastes so good!  This is one of my family favorites!"
ins:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Place pork chops in a 9x13 baking dish.  In a small bowl stir together the marmalade and soy sauce.  Pour over the chops.  Cover with foil and bake for 1 hour.
